content: lower edge ending with round 2 now knit round 3 and divide the stitches on your needle into four sections place markers to separate these markers should be a different color from your end-of-round marker the markers should be placed between the yarnovers and your next knit stitch if your double pointed needles are long enough to accommodate you can place each section on each of four double pointed needles and knit with the fifth if you originally cast on 73 stitches you will have 27 stitches in each section counting yarnovers knit rounds 4 1 and 2 one more time instead of round 3 skip to round 5 to shape the top of the hat round 5 color a k2 slip the yo as if to purl until you are 6 stitches counting yos before your first section marker then k2tog slip yo twice to marker sm repeat 3 more times to end of round round 6 color b s1yo brk1 to 4 stitches before marker counting yos sm s1yo k3tog sm repeat 3 more times to end of round round 7 same as round 1 slip markers round 8 same as round 2 slip markers repeat row 5-8 slipping each section onto one of four double pointed needles until there are only 6 stitches remaining between markers ending with round 8 drop b and finish with color a only round 9 k2tog s around round 10 knit around round 11 k2tog around cut yarn leaving a 6-inch tail thread the yarn onto a darning needle and insert into the remaining 8 stitches pull tight and secure darn in the ends
